findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized upgrade of its scripts.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls
findings.description: The functions transfer, approve, transferFrom, increaseAllowance, decreaseAllowance, set, remove, excludeFromDividends, includeInDividends, updateDividendMinimum, updateClaimWait, process, and processAccount are not properly protected.
findings.function: _transfer, withdrawDividend, excludeFromDividends, includeInDividends, updateDividendMinimum, updateClaimWait, process, processAccount
